page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content:
3) If he suceeds he calls out Victory and raises his arms in the air, and the remaining players have to run to the opposite home without being caught.
4)Any player who is caught has to join the player(s) who are on it. 5) The catcher (when he calls a player) can count to ten, and if by the time he has counted to ten,the player he has called has not run, the catcher can come into the home and try to catch him.
This is a rough game, and sometimes the children thunder across the playground like a herd of elephants. The game ends when all the players are chasing one person. It is a very exciting game.
